Description: You have an important message to deliver. [Look at the letter in your inventory to see its destination.]
LevelDescriptionText: 1|You have an important letter to deliver.~2|You've stealthily read the letter.~3|The letter has clearly been opened.
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|You have an important letter to deliver.~2|No one will ever know. Right?~3|The letter was open when you got it.
Name: Undercrow: Delivering a Letter
